title: Is it possible to block certain types of ads from my game?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I am a developer and I use Unity Ads in my game.
  • I would like to prevent certain ads from being shown in my game.

sections.title: Cause
content: Certain ads are being shown in your game and you would like to filter out those ads.

sections.title: Resolution
content: You can select to filter out genres in your Unity Ads dashboard.

• Login to https://unityads.unity3d.com/admin
  • Go to Games > Select Game > Monetization settings > Advanced settings > Genre blacklist
Please contact us if this feature is not available at the moment.

sections.title: More Information
content: Please also see this article for more in filtering.
